name: Sky Blue Towel
description: A soft, sky blue towel that brings the calming essence of the clear sky to your bath time routine. Perfect for everyday use and made from eco-friendly, absorbent material.

name: Grapefruit Towel
description: This vibrant grapefruit-colored towel adds a burst of energy to your bathroom. Soft and luxurious, it offers quick drying and a fresh pop of color to your day.

name: Sunshine Towel
description: Bright and cheerful, the Sunshine Towel in a golden yellow hue is perfect for beach days or brightening up your bathroom. Lightweight and highly absorbent, it brings the warmth of the sun to every use.
